CommandDefinition.Name: loadlogproperties
CommandDefinition.Description: Load the log properties from file.
CommandDefinition.ExtendedDescription: If the optional filename is not set, the currently loaded property file will be used if the factory was started with log4j file configuration options. Existing configurations will not be discarded, but overridden if redefined. Reloading properties from file results in a very short time frame in which no log levels are set.
